_sText:
[No-Knife spawn fixed + buyzones added + hostage rescue mission].

Okay this is the base of the awesome n2's aim_deagle7k, modified, for sniper flavor.

Now players have AWP + Deagle + Grenades. Fully balanced.

The gate is for huge balls knife battles, shoot the knifers ONLY if you are stupid and lammer and you like ruin others players game. (yes i know i must put func_wall for protect knifers, maybe in another versions...)

There is a AUG hidden, lol... i fucking love aug...
2 Quick bomb targets in the center of map.
No hostages were injured in my bathroom.

(i have removed extra useless lighting and delete the hdr to get more fps)

Enjoy, snipers.

(please tell me how to get rid of this fucking avatar the page for doing that is blankkkkkk...)
